projects.name: Apple Farmer
projects.description: Become a farmer in the Wild West and grow the biggest, best apples!

projects.name: Cow Brusher
projects.description: Become a brusher in the Wild West and brush the cutest, fluffiest cows!

projects.name: Barn Raiser
projects.description: Become a raiser in the Wild West and raise the reddest, woodiest barn!

projects.name: Corn Popper
projects.description: Become a popper in the Wild West and pop the poppiest, poppiest corn!
